The page title is not there (in window title bar) in maximized window (tabs are itself in the title), neither it is there in restored mode.

But, while restoring/maximizing the window, it suddenly appears with a flicker for a split sec during the animation then invisible again.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Press Restore button & keep looking near the app-menu button
2. Press Maximize button & keep looking near the app-menu button
comments.creator: debloper@gmail.com
